originalText.text: My 5 year old daughter has had a great experience with SwimJim since joining in May. At the start of the summer she was not swimming independently, and after weekly classes and a weekly independent practice of the skills she learned at SwimJim, she has become a great little swimmer. She currently takes classes with Naidely who is very patient and helpful at explaining what to do. We have taken classes with a variety of teachers though and they've all been really great. I'm really pleased with SwimJim and highly recommend it.

originalText.text: I have been very impressed with SwimJim! The classes are small and they really focus on muscle memory and the correct techniques for proper swimming. My daughter had the basics down, but is really getting focused attention on her form. Her coach, Huchela De La Cruz, is pretty awesome in showing the students how to move, either by demonstration or guiding their bodies through the movement.

text.text: I have been very impressed with SwimJim! The classes are small and they really focus on muscle memory and the correct techniques for proper swimming. My daughter had the basics down, but is really getting focused attention on her form. Her coach, Huchela De La Cruz, is pretty awesome in showing the students how to move, either by demonstration or guiding their bodies through the movement.

originalText.text: My daughter started swim babies with Ayaana at this location a little after she turned two, and just graduated to their swim tots class with Jade at 2.5. Both of her instructors have been so patient and encouraging, and it’s been a painless process to get her signed up and setting up makeup classes. She loves coming to swim classes and is learning so much!

text.text: My daughter started swim babies with Ayaana at this location a little after she turned two, and just graduated to their swim tots class with Jade at 2.5. Both of her instructors have been so patient and encouraging, and it’s been a painless process to get her signed up and setting up makeup classes. originalText.text: SwimJim has been great for my daughter who started going at around 4 months and is still there at 4. They have made her so comfortable with the water, and how to be safe in and around it. Ayaana Sabb and Rosemary Ghigliotty have been fantastic with my daughter, who can be very stubborn, getting her to do the exercises even when she is resistant. I would highly recommend this program at any age.

text.text: SwimJim has been great for my daughter who started going at around 4 months and is still there at 4. They have made her so comfortable with the water, and how to be safe in and around it. originalText.text: We couldn’t be happier about our son starting lessons at Swim Jim. After only a short time with his coach Ayana, we’ve seen a big improvement also his self-confidence. Ayana and the staff are caring, attentive, and most importantly, patient! It’s his favorite part of the week and he’s sure to tell everyone where he goes swimming! I would recommend Swim Jim to any parent that is looking for a combination of technical lessons and a positive, encouraging environment.
